57445.<voice 00255_00057445><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00255_00057445><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Hey, you... Your soul is a slightly different color

57446.<voice 00320_00057446><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00320_00057446><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>...I see, <pc>, is it. I've come here to save
this town from evil spirits. Feel free to ask me if
you have any questions.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57447.<voice 00120_00057447><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00120_00057447><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>The letter... Looks like you delivered it, right?
You don't even have to tell me; I already know...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57448.<voice 00170_00057448><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00170_00057448><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...''Today, <pc> arrived and delivered a
letter from Lucolia, it's just--it's a bit of a
puzzling story to tell.''<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57449.<voice 00200_00057449><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00200_00057449><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>''Is there another Celed where we were

57450.<voice 00230_00057450><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00230_00057450><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>''I'm more relieved now knowing that Lucolia
is safe, but what is going on...?''<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57451.<voice 00315_00057451><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00315_00057451><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I read through this diary you gave me...
And it has entries dated after my
sister's death.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57452.<voice 00365_00057452><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00365_00057452><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...This beautiful handwriting is definitely my
sister's. It's like she's writing in this
diary from Heaven.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57453.<voice 00395_00057453><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00395_00057453><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>The adults and I disappeared... A familiar,
Muccino, and a genie... And then...
A traveler named <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57454.<voice 00435_00057454><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00435_00057454><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I asked you for a favor to test you, but...
As I expected, you can go to where she is.
<auto_br=5000>
Please, can you tell me more... About my
sister and the others.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57456.<voice 00535_00057456><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00535_00057456><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Firo, Mizar, Miraka... All the kids that

57457.<voice 00595_00057457><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00595_00057457><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...That Celed you went to is where the

57458.<voice 00635_00057458><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00635_00057458><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I don't understand the reason, but as long
